channel.title: Abouts on Timm Lichte
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Timm Lichte

item.title: About
item.description: As of September 2018, I’m coordinator of the Department of Computer Science at the University of Tübingen. Currently, I’m furthermore filling a substitute professorship (50%) on “Applied Computational Linguistics” at the University of Bielefeld. Before that, I was postdoc researcher and principal investigator in project A02 of the CRC991 at the University of Düsseldorf. Before that, I did my PhD within Laura Kallmeyer’s Emmy Noether project at the University of Tübingen.
